translation.en: -[sighs] -[operator] Good morning, Miss Belmont. This is your wake-up call.
translation.zh: 早安 贝尔蒙特小姐 这里是叫醒服务电话

translation.en: [operator] Would you like me to send up your--
♪ Everybody's waitin' For the man with the bag ♪
Tell your father you don't want the job.
translation.zh: 跟你爸说 你不想要这份工作

translation.en: He flew me all the way up here in his private jet for Christmas.
translation.zh: 他让我坐他的私人飞机来这里过圣诞

translation.en: I don't want to hurt his feelings. [sighs]

translation.zh: 哇 早上好 贝尔蒙特小姐 我是宾客服务部的特里卡佛

translation.en: I'm Terry Carver from Guest Services. Your father has asked me
translation.zh: 哇 早上好 贝尔蒙特小姐 我是宾客服务部的特里卡佛 您父亲派我做您的私人助理

translation.en: to work as your personal assistant while you're here.
translation.zh: 您父亲派我做您的私人助理

translation.en: And this is your Glam Squad.
translation.zh: 我身后是您的魅力小队

translation.en: It's just that I don't want to be in the hotel business.
translation.zh: 只是我不想进入酒店业

translation.en: Have you tried telling him that?
As far as he's concerned, this is the perfect career for me.
translation.zh: 在他看来 这对我来说是完美的职业

translation.en: [man] I'm just trying to imagine what you'd have to wear.
translation.zh: 我只是在想你要穿戴些什么

translation.en: Not a name tag, I hope.
-What exactly is the position? -Vice President of Atmosphere.
translation.zh: -是什么职位来着？ -酒店氛围副总裁

translation.en: It's not even a real job. I think he just made it up to give me something to do.
translation.zh: 都不是正经职衔 可能就是他编出来给我找事做的

translation.en: [groans] And, you know, it's hard enough for me as it is.
When people look at me, all they see is the spoiled daughter
translation.zh: 人们看着我 都只觉得 我是酒店大亨博勒加德贝尔蒙特

translation.en: of Beauregard Belmont, the hotel magnate. And I'm not spoiled!
translation.zh: 娇生惯养的千金 可我不是娇生惯养！

translation.en: I don't know. Is that pleather?
translation.zh: 我不知道 那是氨纶仿皮革吗？

translation.en: Oh, Tad, help me! I need to make my own mark in the world.
translation.zh: 塔德 帮帮我！我要打造自己的事业

translation.en: [Tad] Okay, okay. How are your socials doing?
translation.zh: 好吧 你的社交账号怎么样？

translation.en: Not good. I told you my accounts were hacked by that girl, remember?
translation.zh: 不怎么样 你不记得了吗？ 我说我的账号被那个女的给黑了

translation.en: Ugh! Right. Lucky you're dating one of Hype Magazine's
translation.zh: 对哈 幸好你男友是《热炒》杂志

translation.en: [sighs] So you remind me every day.
why don't we hit the slopes and snap a few ussies? Hmm?
translation.zh: 咱们去滑雪吧 再来几张自拍合照怎么样？

translation.en: I thought you wanted to keep our relationship private.
translation.zh: 我以为你不想公开我们的关系

translation.en: [Tad] Well, maybe it's time we let the world in on it.
translation.zh: 或许是时候让大家知道了

translation.en: And it will prove to your father you could have a career as an influencer too.
translation.zh: 这也能向你父亲证明 你也可以成为网红

translation.en: Yeah, I just want people to remember me for more than my last name.
translation.zh: 就是 我不想让人们觉得 我只是一个富二代

translation.en: -You leave it to your Tad. -[phone chimes]
Time for a selfie in a limo. See you soon.
translation.zh: 豪车自拍时间到 一会见

translation.en: Something like that. Let's go with the Valenyagi.
translation.zh: 差不多 就穿瓦伦亚奇吧
嗨！能遇到您真是太好了

translation.en: Hi. Hey. Uh, I'm Jake Russell. I own the--
translation.zh: 您好 我叫杰克拉塞尔 我是…

translation.en: Yeah, my secretary mentioned you called.
I just wanted a minute of your time if I could.
translation.zh: 我可否占用您几分钟时间？

translation.en: But you're gonna have to beat me to the bottom of the run.
translation.zh: 但这趟滑下去 你得赢过我

translation.en: Yeah, I thought I had you there for a minute, but you got me in the end.
translation.zh: 是啊 我一度以为超过您了 不过最后还是您赢了

translation.en: Let's go. You can talk while we walk.
Wow, this place looks like something out of SpaceX.
translation.zh: 哇 这里感觉就像太空探索科技公司

translation.en: Well, we try to stay ahead of the curve.
Wow. Well, you have an incredible place here, sir.
translation.zh: 先生 您的酒店真了不起

translation.en: It's, uh, truly a world-class skiing destination.
translation.zh: 真是世界级的滑雪胜地

translation.en: But, you know, not everybody can afford world-class.
translation.zh: 不过 并非所有人 都能买得起世界级享受

translation.en: Studies show that 70% of beginners learn to ski at these smaller resorts.
translation.zh: 研究显示 70％的初学者 会在小型度假村里学滑雪

translation.en: Exactly. And then as they become more accomplished and better skiers,
translation.zh: 没错 等技术精进之后

translation.en: then they move up to the mega-resorts, like this one.
translation.zh: 他们就会到 更高级的度假地 比如这里

translation.en: And you think that I should invest in your lodge
translation.zh: 你认为我应该投资你的旅馆

translation.en: in order to make sure that this keeps happening, correct?
translation.zh: 这种升级输送就会源源不断 对吧？
哦 斯凯勒 喝热可可吗？
好的 贝尔蒙特先生

translation.en: But I have the numbers here for a cost-effective upgrade,
translation.zh: 这里是我测算的数据 包括成本效益理想的翻修

translation.en: a high-speed lift, you know, building on a spa with a hot tub, sauna--
translation.zh: 配备高速电梯 搭配有热水浴缸和桑拿的水疗吧…

translation.en: Mr. Russell, I wish I could help you, but I have my own investors to answer to.
translation.zh: 拉塞尔先生 我也想帮你 但我也要对自己的投资者负责

translation.en: -I'm sure you understand. Thank you, dear. -Well--
translation.zh: -相信你能理解 谢谢你 亲爱的 -这…

translation.en: Here you go. On the house.
-And anything else he may need today. -Of course.
translation.zh: -今天他在这里的所有消费都算我的 -好的

translation.en: If you'll excuse me, I gotta run.
Oh, and, uh, pretty classy out there letting me win.
translation.zh: 对了 你挺会做事 还让我赢

translation.en: [man] This is security. Alert the staff. Miss Belmont is on the move.
translation.zh: 这里是保安 通知工作人员 贝尔蒙特小姐已经出发

translation.en: -No, he did not go for it. -[man] Ah, bummer.
-Well, yeah. It was a long shot anyways. -[man] Sorry, man.
translation.zh: -反正胜算也不大 -抱歉 伙计

translation.en: -Yeah. See you back at the lodge. -[man] Okay. See you soon.
Okay. Well, I'm in the lobby. I don't see you.
translation.zh: 我在大厅 没看到你啊

translation.en: and let's be honest, I'm pretty hard to miss.
translation.zh: 老实说 我挺显眼的

translation.en: Look, I'm by a tapestry that goes really well with my jacket.
translation.zh: 我旁边有块挂毯 跟我的外套颜色还挺配

translation.en: Now I'm in the lounge by the fireplace.
translation.zh: 现在我在壁炉旁的休息区
-嘿！ -我穿了一件瓦伦亚奇红裙…

translation.en: I am so sorry. I didn't see you there.
translation.zh: 真抱歉 我没看见你

translation.en: Oh, I'd happily pay for your dry cleaning, or get some club soda…
translation.zh: 我很乐意付你干洗费 或者弄些苏打水…
哎呀！别弄毁瓦伦亚奇啊！

translation.en: -He ran right into me. -It was an accident!
You know, I came around the corner, she was coming around,
translation.zh: 我从转角过来 她刚好走过来

translation.en: -and we just, wham, a chocolate thing. -Is everything all right?
translation.zh: -然后撞到一起 洒一身巧克力 -有什么问题吗？

translation.en: -I'm a little flustered, but thank you. -Tad!
translation.zh: -我有点慌张 但谢谢你的关心 -塔德！

translation.en: Oh, but this local yokel just body slammed my girlfriend
translation.zh: 但这个乡巴佬撞了我的女朋友

translation.en: and ruined her haute couture onesie.
translation.zh: 还毁了她的高级定制礼服

translation.en: -Again, I'm so sorry. It was an accident. -Look, mate. Just go, all right? Just go.
translation.zh: -真的非常抱歉 这是意外 -好了 老兄 赶紧走吧 好吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah. Easy with the finger.
Would mademoiselle care for the artisanal, house-smoked bacon on her wedge salad?
translation.zh: 小姐的莴苣沙拉 要不要加点手工自制培根？

translation.en: No, thank you. I don't do bacon.
translation.zh: 不必了 谢谢 我不吃培根

translation.en: So, Ted, how is this online internet business thing of yours going?
translation.zh: 泰德 你的在线网上生意怎么样？

translation.en: It's Tad, Daddy. And it's not a business thing.
translation.zh: 爸爸 是塔德 他做的不是生意

translation.en: Tad's an influencer. Millions of people follow him.
translation.zh: 塔德是网红 有上百万人关注他
基本上 你就是做销售

translation.en: So how long have you two been seeing each other now?

translation.zh: 快一年了 贝尔蒙特先生

translation.en: I think it's time you call him Beauregard.
translation.zh: 我觉得你可以叫他“博勒加德”了

translation.en: You know how it is. One day…
In the coffee shop of life.
-[man 2] Hi, Jake. -Hi, how's it going? Hey, buddy.
translation.zh: -嗨 杰克 -怎么样？嘿 伙计

translation.en: Trying to get this one going, but it's not happening.
translation.zh: 想发动它 但这玩意不听话

translation.en: Okay. Yeah, just leave it in the shed, and I'll get to it later.
translation.zh: 把它停在小屋里 我晚点修

translation.en: Dad! The Christmas Wish Tree, remember? Mom took us every year.
translation.zh: 爸爸！还记得圣诞愿望树吗？ 妈妈每年都带我们去

translation.en: Jake! Why don't you come with us?
translation.zh: 杰克！不如跟我们一起去吧？

translation.en: Well, as fun as that sounds,
I have guests that want a sleigh ride, so I'll take a snow check this time.
translation.zh: 但有些客人想坐雪橇 所以只能改天了

translation.en: But would you do me a favor? Would you put in a good word with Santa for me?
translation.zh: 但帮我一个忙好吗？ 能不能跟圣诞老人多说我几句好话？

translation.en: I need all the help I can get.
translation.zh: 我需要尽可能多的帮助

translation.en: I take it things didn't go well?
Belmont was literally the last resort. If the rest of the season's this way, I don't think--
translation.zh: 贝尔蒙特是我们最后的希望了 如果今年圣诞季还没有起色 恐怕…

translation.en: We just need a little patience.
What we need is a miracle.
Haven't you heard, Dad? Christmas is a time for miracles.
translation.zh: 爸爸 你没听过吗？ 圣诞就是奇迹的节日

translation.en: All right. Yeah. Bring me back something good.
translation.zh: 好吧 带些好东西回来

translation.en: Yeah. I'm ready to leave for the airport. Could you have my car brought around?
translation.zh: 我准备去机场了 你能把我的车开过来吗？

translation.en: -[staff] Yes, Mr. Belmont. -Oh, good. You're still here.
translation.zh: 好 贝尔蒙特先生 -太好了 您还没走 -哦 嗨！

translation.en: -Oh, hi! -I didn't wanna miss you before you left.
translation.zh: -太好了 您还没走 -哦 嗨！ 我不想错过跟您道别

translation.en: Well, I'll be back by the weekend.
We will get you set up in your new office.
translation.zh: 我们会帮你安排新办公室

translation.en: I was thinking the one next to mine if that's okay?
translation.zh: 我打算安排在我隔壁 可以吗？
爸爸 关于工作的事

translation.en: I just don't wanna disappoint you. [laughs] I don't think you could do that, honey.
translation.zh: -我不想让您失望 -亲爱的 你不可能让我失望

translation.en: Oh, I haven't seen this in a while.
Your mother gave me that in Gstaad.
translation.zh: 你妈妈在格斯塔德送给我的

translation.en: [Beauregard] She said that the little girl reminded her of you.
translation.zh: 她说里面的小女孩会让她想到你

translation.en: You were only five when she…
I remember her perfume and her laugh.
translation.zh: 我记得她的香水味和笑声

translation.en: How she used to brush my hair.
translation.zh: 还有以前她怎样帮我梳头发

translation.en: [sighs] This hotel reminds me so much of her.
translation.zh: 这家酒店总是让我想到她

translation.en: I promised your mother I'd take care of you.
translation.zh: 我答应你母亲会照顾好你

translation.en: I mean, you've given me everything I've ever wanted.
Well, honey, I'll be back by Christmas Eve.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 我平安夜就回来

translation.en: I'll be in very good hands.
Now, I don't want to be disturbed when I'm with Tad.
translation.zh: 跟塔德在一起时 我不想被打扰

translation.en: If I need anything, I'll text you.
translation.zh: 如果需要什么 我会给你发短信

translation.en: Of course. When would you like dinner sent up to your suite?
translation.zh: 当然 晚餐几点送到您的套房？
特里 我说过了 “别打扰我”
小姐 您的马车备好了

translation.en: I thought we were doing the photo shoot here.
Yeah, I've reserved a private gondola.
translation.zh: 是啊 我预约了一个私人缆车车厢

translation.en: [snorts] Gondolas are for losers. Hop in.
translation.zh: 衰人才坐缆车呢 上车吧

translation.en: [sighs] You know, Daddy would have loved if we did the shoot here.
translation.zh: 要是我们在这里拍照 爸爸会很高兴的

translation.en: Just you wait, angel cakes. -Just you wait. -[car rumbles]
translation.zh: 你就等着瞧吧 小心肝
大过节的 你就不能厚道点？

translation.en: All right, lovebirds. I got hot cocoa and fresh gingerbread cookies.
translation.zh: 好了 我给你们小两口 准备了热可可和新鲜出炉的姜饼

translation.en: My friend, this fine piece of craftsmanship
translation.zh: 伙计 这件精工巧物

translation.en: has served the North Star for generations.
translation.zh: 世代效力于北极星旅馆
你的冒险精神哪里去了？
-不会有事的 -祝你们玩得开心

translation.en: I follow one of the top off-trail skiers in the country,
translation.zh: 我关注了一位国内超火的野径滑雪手

translation.en: and he geotagged this secluded spot.
translation.zh: 他标记了这个偏僻的地方

translation.en: You do know I don't actually ski, don't you?
No one needs to know that!
It's all smoke and mirrors, baby. [chuckles]
Do you know how to unhook the snowmobile, by any chance?
translation.zh: 你知道怎么解锁雪地车吗？

translation.en: Do I look like I know how to unhook a snowmobile?
Tad, it's not voice-activated, for God's sake!
translation.zh: 塔德 拜托 这东西不能声控！

translation.en: Tad! I'm getting beaten back here!
No signal, okay. Guess we just have to wing it.
translation.zh: 没有信号 好吧 看来我们得见机行事了

translation.en: You don't know how to get back to the car, do you? Yes, I do.
translation.zh: -你不知道回去的路 对吧？ -不对 我认得
（小心！危险勿行 请调头） 塔德！

translation.en: Hot roasted chestnuts, folks, right here. Okay. [laughing]
translation.zh: 乡亲们 这可是热烤栗子

translation.en: And remember, you only get one wish, so make it count.
translation.zh: 记住 只能许一个愿望 千万别浪费

translation.en: That's good, but could you try to look a little more athletic?
translation.zh: 很好 但你能不能看起来更矫健点？

translation.en: But, Tad, I wanna look… I wanna look sporty, but not like I'm sweating.
translation.zh: 塔德 我也想要动感 但不要汗淋淋那种

translation.en: Well, I can't quite put my finger on it,
Sierra Belmont, the last almost-a-year with you
translation.zh: 谢拉贝尔蒙特 过去快一年的时间 跟你在一起

translation.en: And I want you to know that whatever the future brings,
translation.zh: 我想让你知道 无论未来如何

translation.en: I want it to bring us together.

translation.zh: 塔德 亲爱的 戒指太大了

translation.en: [Tad] Let's make it official, shall we?
Our first social media post as an engaged couple!
translation.zh: 订婚情侣的第一条社交更新！

translation.en: You have to keep it a secret, or it won't come true.
translation.zh: 你必须保密 否则就不会实现了

translation.en: -You guys have a Merry Christmas. -[woman] Thank you.
Um… Uh… I got my wish.
When your mommy and daddy had you.
Okay. Let's put it up in that branch.
translation.zh: 我们把它挂在那条树枝上

translation.en: Take me back to the hotel.
-Oh, it better not be a dead body. -Stop it. You're freaking me out.
translation.zh: -最好别是尸体 -别说了 你吓死我了

translation.en: Hey, miss, can you hear me?
translation.zh: 嘿 小姐 能听到我说话吗？

translation.en: Hey, base camp, this is Jake. I'm on the far side of Hoosier.
translation.zh: 大本营 我是杰克 现正在胡谢尔的另一侧

translation.en: We have a Code 3. Repeat, Code 3. I need Ski Patrol immediately.
translation.zh: 这里发生紧急情况 请滑雪巡逻队立即增援

translation.en: Physically, she's all right. Minor concussion.
translation.zh: 身体没有大碍 轻微脑震荡

translation.en: But that's not the real problem.
She says she doesn't remember anything prior to the accident.
translation.zh: 她说完全不记得事故之前的事了

translation.en: Well, at least she's awake. That's a good thing, right?
translation.zh: 至少她醒了 这是好征兆 对吧？

translation.en: Well, that depends upon your point of view.

translation.zh: -女士 请别动 -住手！别碰我！

translation.en: No, don't touch me! Would you get your hands off of me?
translation.zh: -女士 请别动 -住手！别碰我！ 你能不能放开我？

translation.en: Look, I told you I'm perfectly fine, okay?
translation.zh: 听着 我跟你说了 我没事 好吗？

translation.en: -[exhales] -[doctor] It's okay. We'll try later. -Thank you, Gene. We'll take it from here. -[Gene sighs]
translation.zh: 没关系 我们晚点再试 谢谢你 吉恩 这里交给我们

translation.en: Finally, at last, someone with authority.
Sheriff, could you please tell her to let me out of here?
translation.zh: 警长 你能不能叫她放我走？

translation.en: Well, miss, we'd love to be able to do that,
but first we need to figure out who you are.
translation.zh: 但我们得先弄清楚你的身份

translation.en: What do you mean who I am?
Well, we checked your clothing for any identification,
translation.zh: 我们在你衣服里找证件

translation.en: Oh! I mean, I did find this.
I'm afraid the ER team had to cut you out of those.
translation.zh: 急诊室剪开衣服才能抢救

translation.en: Hey, uh, what about fingerprints? We took those when we brought her in.
translation.zh: -那指纹呢？ -送她过来时 我们采了指纹

translation.en: They're not registered in our database, which means she's never been arrested
translation.zh: 但数据库中没有记录 也就意味着她没有被捕过

translation.en: So what are we supposed to do with her?
Well, I could put her picture up on our missing person website.
translation.zh: 我可以把她的照片放上失踪者网站

translation.en: But it is the holidays, you know.
Until someone comes looking for her or until she remembers something,
translation.zh: 除非有人来找她 或者她想起来

translation.en: there's not much I can do.
translation.zh: 否则我也帮不上什么了

translation.en: Excuse me, she is right here in the room,
translation.zh: 不好意思 “她”就在这房间里

translation.en: and she is tired of being treated like a prisoner
just because you all can't do your job, so…
translation.zh: 就因为你们无法做好自己的工作…

translation.en: Take it easy. Take it easy.
-[groans] -[sheriff] Look, miss. I wish there was more that I could do,
translation.zh: 听着 小姐 我也想帮你

translation.en: but we have procedures to follow when we're dealing with a Jane Doe.
translation.zh: 但处理无名氏时 我们有程序要遵守

translation.en: I am not a Jane Doe!
Well, I don't know what else to call you.
You've got no identity, no money, and no place to go.
translation.zh: 你没有身份 没有钱 没有地方可去

translation.en: I have a place. I mean, the lodge.
translation.zh: 我有地方 我是说旅馆

translation.en: I mean, we have some cancellations. She could stay with us.
translation.zh: 有人取消预订 她可以住我们那里

translation.en: This is Jake Russell. He's the one who found you.
translation.zh: 这位是杰克拉塞尔 就是他发现你的

translation.en: Does he look familiar to you at all?
No, he is definitely a stranger.
And I'm not about to follow him to some murder cabin in the woods.
translation.zh: 我也不会跟着他去树林里的杀人小屋

translation.en: Jake owns the North Star Lodge.
translation.zh: 杰克是北极星旅馆的老板

translation.en: [scoffs] Okay. Does it have room service?
translation.zh: 好吧 有客房服务吗？

translation.en: You know, it's actually more of, like, a bed-and-breakfast type place.
translation.zh: 我家旅馆更像是住宿带早餐那种

translation.en: On second thought, I think she's probably better off here.
translation.zh: 仔细想想 她还是待在这里比较好

translation.en: Actually, you know, reestablishing a normal routine of activities
translation.zh: 其实 重新建立日常活动习惯

translation.en: It's up to you. Now, you can stay here,
translation.zh: 由你决定 小姐 你可以留在这里

translation.en: or you can take old Jake up on his offer.

translation.zh: 你好 我是塔德费尔柴尔德

translation.en: I've just survived a death-defying fall,
translation.zh: 我刚才坠山了 劫后余生

translation.en: and I'm currently stranded in a remote glacial forest.
translation.zh: 目前困在某处偏僻的冰川森林

translation.en: This recording will be a testament
to my brave fight for life against all odds.
But should anyone find my body…
translation.zh: 如果有人找到我的遗体…

translation.en: All righty. Went through the lost and found.
translation.zh: 好了 我在失物招领处翻了翻

translation.en: Not sure if these will fit, but they're better than scrubs.
translation.zh: 也不知这些合不合身 但总比住院服强

translation.en: Guess they'll have to do for now.
But, you know, sometimes guests leave things here by accident, so…
translation.zh: 但客人有时会不小心把东西落下…

translation.en: Not sure this was left here by accident.
translation.zh: 这件可能不是“不小心”落下的
好了 你的房间准备好了

translation.en: Here are some fresh towels, and there are clean sheets on the bed.
translation.zh: 这是新毛巾 床上有干净的床单

translation.en: Look, I appreciate everything you guys are doing,
but I'm not gonna be here for that long. This is just temporary.
translation.zh: 但我不会待那么久的 这只是暂时的

translation.en: Well, until then, you're stuck with us.
translation.zh: 在你走之前 只能跟我们待着了

translation.en: Hi. Uh… There was a wild, hairy beast out there!
translation.zh: 外面有一个毛乎乎的野兽！

translation.en: I think you're okay. They're gone.
translation.zh: 应该没事 已经走了

translation.en: You know, we are out in the wilderness, so you're bound to have a few visitors from time to time.
translation.zh: 周围是荒野 有时会有几个“访客”

translation.en: Right. Well, they can stay out there.
translation.zh: 是哦 它们就待在外头吧
好的 我会告诉它们的

translation.en: I thought I'd never see another human being again.
translation.zh: 我以为再也见不到其他人类了
救星啊 你叫什么名字？

translation.en: I don't suppose you have a charger here for the model 15, do you?
translation.zh: 你这里应该没有15型的充电器吧？

translation.en: Uh, no. Don't like cell phones.
translation.zh: 没有 我不喜欢手机
好的 有劳了 拉尔夫

translation.en: [laughs] After my nightmarish ordeal, that would be the nectar of the gods.
translation.zh: 经历了噩梦般的考验之后 咖啡就像是诸神的琼浆

translation.en: Can I help get that lure out your face?
translation.zh: 要我帮你把脸上的鱼饵取下来吗？

translation.en: The one stuck in your face.
Yeah, nobody's come to clean it yet.
translation.zh: 是啊 还没人来清扫

translation.en: You're the lady who doesn't know who she is, right?
translation.zh: 你就是那位 不知道自己是谁的姑娘吧？

translation.en: Do you have anything I could dry my hair with?
-[Avy] Of course. In my room. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -当然了 在我房间里 -谢谢

translation.en: So, what are we supposed to call you?
Good question. I don't know. Do you have any names you like?
translation.zh: 问得好 我也不知道 你有喜欢的名字吗？

translation.en: You can have one of theirs.
translation.zh: 你可以从他们当中选一个

translation.en: That's Frankie, that's Wallace, that's Potter, and that's Sarah.
translation.zh: 它们叫弗兰基 华莱士 波特 莎拉

translation.en: She died almost two years ago.

translation.zh: 算了 你会觉得我奇怪的

translation.en: Well, I don't even know who I am. Nothing's weirder than that.
translation.zh: 我都不知道自己是谁 这才叫奇怪呢

translation.en: Sometimes I talk to her picture.
translation.zh: 有时候 我跟她的照片说话

translation.en: I don't think that's weird at all. I think that's beautiful.
translation.zh: 一点都不奇怪 多美好啊

translation.en: -We met on the sleigh ride. -You were unconscious the whole time.
translation.zh: -我们坐雪橇时见过 -但你当时昏迷不醒

translation.en: You've already met my dad. This is my grandma.
translation.zh: 你已经见过我爸了 这位是我外婆

translation.en: Well, Sarah, we just ran out of pumpkin pancakes,
translation.zh: 莎拉 我们的南瓜煎饼已经没了

translation.en: but if you'd like, I can make you some eggs.
translation.zh: 但如果你愿意 我可以给你做几个鸡蛋

translation.en: Oh, please, I'm perfectly capable of making my own breakfast.
translation.zh: 没关系 我可以自己做早餐的

translation.en: Yeah. No, you just gotta… You gotta push it in and then twist it.
translation.zh: 不是 你得推进去 然后再拧

translation.en: Well, you showed that egg who's boss.
translation.zh: 还真是你的鸡蛋你做主

translation.en: You know what? Um… Why don't you sit over there,
and I will take care of all of this.
Then how do you know you don't do it? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 那你怎么知道自己不吃？

translation.en: [Sierra] What are these muffins? I don't think she's from around here, dear.
translation.zh: -这是什么松饼？ -我觉得她不是本地人

translation.en: -[Sierra] What's your favorite one? -Something about her…
I know-- I feel like I've met her before.
[sighs] Well, she said she didn't want to be disturbed.
But that was almost 24 hours ago.
This is hotel security. May I come in? Hello?
translation.zh: 我是酒店保安 可以进来吗？你好？

translation.en: But she didn't sleep here last night.
Are you sure? Maybe she made the bed?
translation.zh: 你确定吗？也许她自己整理床铺了？

translation.en: [scoffs] Miss Belmont make the bed? Not in this lifetime.
translation.zh: 贝尔蒙特小姐整理床铺？不可能

translation.en: "Sierra, can't wait to take you away."
Sounds like they planned to go off someplace together.
translation.zh: 看样子他们是计划一起出去

translation.en: Thought I'd let you sleep in. You looked all cozy.
translation.zh: 我看你睡得挺香 想着让你多睡会
跟昨晚路上撞死的动物一样死翘翘了

translation.en: We'll leave a note, head out on foot.
translation.zh: 我们留张纸条 然后步行出去

translation.en: It's just a couple days' hike through the pass to get to the road.
translation.zh: 只需走几天 过了山口就是公路

translation.en: Hey, how about I whip us up some fried fish for breakfast? Sound good?
translation.zh: 不如我煎条鱼当早餐吧？怎么样？

translation.en: Oh, I don't eat fish. They are exotic pets in my saltwater aquarium
translation.zh: 我不吃鱼 它们是我在曼哈顿公寓
养在咸水鱼缸的异域宠物

translation.en: -What am I supposed to do with this? -Hurl it at a squirrel?
translation.zh: -我用它能做什么？ -对着只松鼠比划？

translation.en: -You're kidding? -They're going to an Airbnb instead.
-Well, how do we compete with that? -It's all going to work out.
translation.zh: -我们哪能比得过啊？ -一定能解决的

translation.en: Well, I don't know how. Look at this. We can't even afford a housekeeper.
translation.zh: 怎么解决啊 瞧瞧 我们连一个服务员都请不起

translation.en: I was just wondering, any calls regarding me?
translation.zh: 我只是想知道 有没有电话找我？

translation.en: I mean, surely someone is out there looking for me.
You haven't been able to remember anything?
No, but the doctor did say that if I did normal things,
translation.zh: 没有 但医生说如果我回归日常

translation.en: But I wonder what she meant by "normal things."
translation.zh: 但我很纳闷 她所谓的“日常”是什么意思

translation.en: Have you ever actually made a bed, dear?
translation.zh: 亲爱的 你自己铺过床吗？

translation.en: Why don't you try something else?
I'm telling you, man, take the gondola up the hill, man…
translation.zh: 我跟你说 老兄 坐缆车上山…

translation.en: Do I just put these here?
[Ralph grunts] Nope. Stick with me, buddy.
translation.zh: 没有 跟紧我 兄弟

translation.en: I don't think I can make it!
Hey, don't you worry about me. I got big feet.
translation.zh: 嘿 别担心我 我的脚很大

translation.en: Hey there. Are you okay? -[Avy] It's stuck. -Oh.
You just have to take your time.
You know, my mom always said,
"The worst tangles will sort themselves out…"
[Sierra's mom] …if you just give them a little help.
-Oh. -It wasn't me, Dad. [Jake] Look at this mess!
translation.zh: -不是我弄的 爸爸 -瞧瞧这里乱得！

translation.en: Great. This is the last thing I need right now.
but I have no idea who I am.
I can tell you I'm pretty much a useless human.
translation.zh: 但我可以告诉你 我是一个没用的人

translation.en: You'd think I'd have some sort of skill, wouldn't you?
translation.zh: 你会觉得人总会有某种技能吧？

translation.en: [sighs] Now, let's see if I can manage to fetch some wood.
translation.zh: 现在看看我是否做得了取木柴的活儿

translation.en: I didn't mean what I said earlier. It was…
translation.zh: 我早前的话是无心的 只是…

translation.en: [sighs] It's been almost two days, and what? No one's found me yet?
translation.zh: 已经快两天 居然还是没人来找我？
我就像无人认领的行李箱

translation.en: Hey, come on. Don't say that.
I… I bet you got family and friends who are worried sick about you.
translation.zh: 你肯定有担心你的家人和朋友

translation.en: I mean, they're probably out there looking for you right now.
translation.zh: 我是说 他们现在就可能在外面找你

translation.en: You know what? Why don't we go to the Christmas Market downtown?
translation.zh: 知道吗？ 不如去市中心的圣诞市场看看？

translation.en: Okay, it's a big street fair, a lot of people there.
translation.zh: 那里有大型集市 人很多

translation.en: You know, maybe somebody will recognize you. I don't wanna be any more trouble.
translation.zh: -也许有人会认出你 -我不想再惹麻烦了

translation.en: No, it's… it's really no trouble.

translation.zh: 再说了 艾薇会很高兴的

translation.en: Nah, that's… You can keep it.
Any of this ring a bell?
No, nothing. I don't think I've ever been here in my life.
translation.zh: 没有 我觉得从来没来过这里

translation.en: [Avy] Come on! You guys are too slow!
Avy gets pretty excited about Christmas.
Yeah, Avy told me about her.
It's been a rough couple of years.
I mean, I didn't even think we were gonna stay here after.
translation.zh: 我甚至觉得以后在这里待不下去了

translation.en: I don't know, like, maybe back to the city?
translation.zh: 我不知道 也许回城里？

translation.en: I used to have a, uh… ski travel business.
translation.zh: 我以前有自己的滑雪旅行生意

translation.en: But the North Star's been in Carla's family for three generations.
translation.zh: 但北极星旅馆是卡拉家里的三代家业

translation.en: Her father gave it to us as a wedding gift,
translation.zh: 他父亲把它送给我们 作为结婚礼物

translation.en: and I kind of just… fell in love with the place.
translation.zh: 他父亲把它送给我们 作为结婚礼物 我立刻就爱上那里了

translation.en: -I don't want to have to sell it, but… -But?
translation.zh: -我不想卖掉它 可是… -可是？

translation.en: You know, people, they… they like the new resorts,
translation.zh: 可人们喜欢新的度假村

translation.en: the flashy stuff, all the bells and whistles.
translation.zh: 喜欢光鲜亮丽 花里胡哨

translation.en: But I still think there's something really special about the simple things.
translation.zh: 但我还是觉得 简单的东西有自己的特别之处
壁炉边的一杯热巧克力

translation.en: You have very good taste in sleighs, young lady.
translation.zh: 小姑娘 你看雪橇很有品味呢

translation.en: This one's a beauty, all handmade.
translation.zh: 这可是件美物 手工制作

translation.en: Um… But I am afraid it is out of our league.
Well, I'm here watching this stall for a friend.
translation.zh: 我在这边帮朋友看摊儿

translation.en: So, if you see anything else that you'd like, well… Oh!
translation.zh: 所以如果你们有其他喜欢的东西…

translation.en: You know what? We'll take it.

translation.zh: -送给你 -不 杰克 我不能收

translation.en: Oh, come on. It's an early Christmas gift.
translation.zh: 拿着吧 早到的圣诞礼物

translation.en: Come on. We don't wanna miss the tree-lighting. Let's go!
translation.zh: -我们可不想错过圣诞树亮灯 -走吧！

translation.en: Please welcome the mayor of Summit Springs.
Welcome, everyone, to our annual Christmas tree-lighting ceremony.
translation.zh: 欢迎大家来参加我们 一年一度的圣诞树亮灯仪式

translation.en: You know, this is such a special event,
translation.zh: 这是一个很特别的活动

translation.en: and just between you and me,
I think it's my favorite reason to be mayor of Summit Springs.
translation.zh: 也是我作为山泉村村长 最享受的地方

translation.en: Ah! But you didn't come here to listen to me yakking, right?
translation.zh: 当然 大家不是来听我叨叨的 对吧？

translation.en: You came in to see some lights. So, hey, without further ado…
translation.zh: 你们是来看亮灯的 事不宜迟

translation.en: Why don't you come on up here, sweetie, and help me pull this switch?
translation.zh: 亲爱的 你何不上来 帮我拉动开关？

translation.en: When we count down, I want you to push that little candy cane, okay?
translation.zh: 大家倒数的时候 你就推那根拐杖糖 好吗？
山泉村的村民们 准备好了吗？
五 四 三 二 一！

translation.en: Come on, I can't hear you.
Who told you that? Come on, it's Christmas.
translation.zh: 谁告诉你的？来嘛 这可是圣诞节
好了 晚安 糖豆

translation.en: You know, um, when you first saw that snow globe,
translation.zh: 你第一次看到那个雪景球时

translation.en: you had this look in your eyes like you had seen it before.
translation.zh: 那种眼神就像你以前见过它

translation.en: Yeah, I suddenly had this memory of being a little girl,
translation.zh: 是啊 我突然想起自己小时候

translation.en: and this beautiful woman gave me something like that.
translation.zh: 有一位美丽的女子送给我一个类似的

translation.en: And I think it might have been my mother.

translation.zh: 然后 记忆就消失了

translation.en: Well, I mean, at least you remembered something. That's a start.
translation.zh: 至少想起一些了 这是好的开端

translation.en: Well, it's been a long night.
Yeah, I'm pretty beat too, so…
translation.zh: 是啊 我也很累了 那就…

translation.en: I just wanted to tell you
I don't think I've ever met anyone like you before
translation.zh: 我想我应该从未见过你这样的人

translation.en: because if I had, I would definitely remember it.
translation.zh: 因为如果有的话 我一定会记得的

translation.en: It's just me, dear. I come to make the…
translation.zh: 我来了 亲爱的 我来帮你…

translation.en: The trick is, it's all in the wrists.
translation.zh: 诀窍就是 关键在手腕

translation.en: Okay, that's okay. One more. Do it again. Again.
translation.zh: 没关系 再来一次 来吧

translation.en: -Okay. You know, just use both hands. -Okay.
[Jake] There you go, hand-eye coordination. All right!
translation.zh: 好的 手眼协调 很好！

translation.en: You have to make sure you use lots of icing to keep it in place.
translation.zh: 你得用很多糖霜才能固定住

translation.en: All right, guys, remember, inside edge, okay?
translation.zh: 好的 各位 记住了 内线边缘 好吗？

translation.en: Last one down buys pizza. Ready?
translation.zh: 倒数第一请披萨 准备好了吗？

translation.en: -[whooping] Looking great, everyone! -Are you ready to ski?
translation.zh: -大家都好棒呢！ -准备好滑雪了吗？

translation.en: I don't know if I remember how.
It's gonna be easy. Follow the kids, take it slow, just like I said.
translation.zh: 很容易 跟着孩子们 慢慢来 就像我说的

translation.en: -Now, let's see what you got. Let's go! -[exhales]
translation.zh: 让我们见识一下吧 走着！
抱歉 我不是故意的

translation.en: All right, nice. Here you go. That's the bill.
translation.zh: 好了 给你 这是账单

translation.en: Thanks for staying at the North Star. And Merry Christmas.
translation.zh: 谢谢你们入住北极星旅馆 圣诞快乐

translation.en: [gasps] Oh, I'm sorry, dear. I didn't see you there.
translation.zh: 真抱歉 亲爱的 我没看见你

translation.en: I'm fine. Just a little blue, I guess.
translation.zh: 我没事 只是有点伤感而已

translation.en: Probably shouldn't have started looking through this in the first place.
translation.zh: 也许根本就不该翻出来看

translation.en: I call it our memory book.
Christmas cards, wedding programs, notes from guests.
translation.zh: 圣诞贺卡 婚礼流程单 客人留言

translation.en: Oh, your daughter. She's really beautiful.
I like to remind myself every now and then
translation.zh: 我总是时不时提醒自己

translation.en: how our little family lodge has touched other people's lives.
translation.zh: 我们的家庭旅馆 如何为他人的生活增色

translation.en: [sighs] …since we might not be here much longer.
translation.zh: 我们可能在这里待不久了

translation.en: I thought Jake didn't want to sell. He might not have a choice.
translation.zh: -杰克不是不打算卖掉的嘛 -也许他别无选择

translation.en: this might be our last Christmas at North Star Lodge.
translation.zh: 今年可能是 北极星旅馆最后一个圣诞了

translation.en: Anyway, that's nothing for you to worry about.
translation.zh: 好了 这也不是你需要操心的事

translation.en: I've got to pick up, Avy.
Can you put that back in Jake's desk when you're done?
translation.zh: 你看完后 放回杰克办公桌 好吗？

translation.en: -Hey, what's going on? -Oh, hi. The drawer was stuck.
translation.zh: -嘿 怎么了？ -嗨 抽屉卡住了

translation.en: Yeah, I've been meaning to fix that.
translation.zh: 是啊 我一直想着修呢

translation.en: This is really beautiful. -Why don't you put it on the tree? -Um…
translation.zh: 这个很漂亮呀 你为什么不把它放到树上？

translation.en: I'm not ready to put it up.
Oh, I'm sorry. It's really none of my business.
translation.zh: 对不起 我多管闲事了

translation.en: No, I'm… I'm sorry. I just… It's…
translation.zh: 没有 是我不好 我…只是…

translation.en: We… We… Um, Carla and I bought it together, and…
translation.zh: 这是…我和卡拉一起买的…

translation.en: I don't… I don't wanna get rid of it,
but I can't bring myself to put it on the tree. So, I…
translation.zh: 又没法把它挂到树上 所以…

translation.en: You know what? I gotta go 'cause I'm gonna be late for the toy drive.
translation.zh: 我得走了 参加玩具慈善捐赠要迟到了

translation.en: Yeah. You know, Summit Springs has one every year
translation.zh: 是啊 山泉村每年都办

translation.en: for families who are having a rough go of it, so…
Yeah, well, you know, every kid deserves something for Christmas.
translation.zh: 是啊 每个孩子 圣诞节都应该有所收获

translation.en: -How's it going? -I just finished my first one.
Okay. Um, pretty good. I'll show you a trick.
translation.zh: 不错啊 我教你一些诀窍

translation.en: You gotta use as little paper as possible.
Wrapping technique shouldn't require more than three pieces of tape.
translation.zh: 包礼物用的胶带纸不应该超过三块

translation.en: So you do it like this,

translation.zh: 杰克 你来真是太好了！

translation.en: Louise, you know I would never forget my Christmas girlfriend.
translation.zh: 露易丝 你知道 我永远不会忘记我的圣诞女友

translation.en: -It looks like you already have. -This is Sarah.
translation.zh: -看起来你已经忘了呀 -这位是莎拉

translation.en: -Nice to meet you. -Nice to meet you.
translation.zh: -很高兴认识你 -很高兴认识你

translation.en: [man] Jake! We need help sorting things out! All right. Um, I'll be right back.
translation.zh: -杰克 我们需要帮忙！ -好了 我马上回来

translation.en: You two… don't talk about me while I'm gone.
translation.zh: 我不在的时候 你们俩可别说我坏话

translation.en: -[both chuckle] -[woman] Hi. Can we drop our toys here?
translation.zh: 嗨 我们能把玩具放在这里吗？

translation.en: -Merry Christmas. Thank you so much. -There you go.
translation.zh: -圣诞快乐 非常感谢 -给你

translation.en: [Louise] I don't know what we'd do without Jake Russell.
translation.zh: 我真不知道 如果没有杰克拉塞尔 我们该怎么办

translation.en: I can't even count how many charities he's helped out in town.
translation.zh: 他支持的本地慈善活动 根本数不过来

translation.en: I just wish that there was some way that Summit Springs could show him how much he means to us.
translation.zh: 真希望有什么方法 能让山泉村的人表达对他的感激

translation.en: -[woman] Great job on this wrapping. -[Jake] I don't know if I did wrap…
translation.zh: -包得不错 -我不知道我有没有包好

translation.en: Again, thank you so much for helping out tonight.
Oh, thank you for inviting me. Everyone was so nice.
translation.zh: 谢谢你邀请我 大家都太好了

translation.en: think you're going to remember any of this when you get your memory back?
translation.zh: 等你恢复记忆了 还会记得这些吗？

translation.en: We are standing under the mistletoe.
You know, maybe we shouldn't do this.
I mean, what if you're with somebody.
translation.zh: 我是说 要是你正跟别人交往呢？

translation.en: I have an idea on how we can help the North Star.
translation.zh: 我想到一个帮助北极星旅馆的主意

translation.en: I've got the contacts for almost every guest we've had

translation.zh: 几乎所有客人的联系方式

translation.en: Cool. Have you talked to dad about it?
translation.zh: 好棒 跟爸爸说过了吗？

translation.en: There's no way I'm having a fundraiser to save the lodge.
translation.zh: 我绝不会通过筹资来拯救旅馆

translation.en: No. It won't be a fundraiser.
It'll be like a Christmas flashback party.
And we'll invite all the guests you've had over the years
translation.zh: 我们会邀请所有以前的客人

translation.en: to celebrate their favorite North Star memories.
translation.zh: 重温最爱的北极星回忆

translation.en: And, okay, yes, we'll ask for a donation, but what's the big deal?
translation.zh: 好吧 我们会号召捐款 但这有什么大不了的？

translation.en: The big deal is I live in Summit Springs, okay?
translation.zh: 关键是 我就住在山泉村 明白吗？

translation.en: I don't want people looking at me differently. I don't want them thinking I need a handout.
translation.zh: 我不想被大家另眼相看 让人家觉得我需要施舍

translation.en: But you don't want to lose the North Star either, do you?
translation.zh: 但你也不想失去北极星旅馆 对吧？

translation.en: Look, I'm tired of struggling with this place.
translation.zh: 我已经受够在旅馆里艰难支撑了

translation.en: I'm tired of everything always breaking down.
translation.zh: 动不动就有东西出故障

translation.en: I'm tired of wondering how we'll make it to the end of the month.
translation.zh: 总是担心能不能撑到月底

translation.en: Jake, you can't turn your back on this lodge.
translation.zh: 杰克 你不能抛弃旅馆

translation.en: -Think about all the memories you've made. -I do. I do. All the time.
translation.zh: -想想你创造的所有记忆 -我知道 我一直在想

translation.en: And to be honest, you know, I'd be happy to let some of them go.
translation.zh: 老实说 我很乐意放弃一部分

translation.en: And what do you know about memories? You can't even remember your name.
translation.zh: 你对记忆又知道些什么？ 你连自己的名字都不记得了
好吧 其实就是因为你

translation.en: Look, ever since you got here, you…
Well, you've made me feel things…
Things that I didn't ever think I was ever going to feel again.
translation.zh: 我以为自己再也不会有这样的感觉了

translation.en: And, yes, you're right. This place does have a lot of memories for me.
translation.zh: 是啊 你说得对 对我来说 这里确实有很多回忆

translation.en: I guess I'm just, you know, afraid of making

translation.zh: 我知道 这感觉很难受
尤其是每年的这个时候

translation.en: I just… I don't really know what I'm doing anymore.
translation.zh: 我只是…我不知道自己在做什么

translation.en: You've been doing everything you can to hold this family together.
translation.zh: 你一直在竭尽全力守住这个家

translation.en: But we are all right now.
translation.zh: 但我们现在已经没事了

translation.en: Sarah. We're making snowflakes. Want to come help me?
translation.zh: 莎拉 我们在做雪花 要来帮忙吗？

translation.en: I'm sorry, I can't right now, Avy, but maybe later.
translation.zh: 抱歉 艾薇 现在还不行 但迟些也许可以

translation.en: Alejandra, can I talk to you for a second?
translation.zh: 阿列翰德拉 能跟你聊聊吗？

translation.en: [sighs] I think it's time for me to leave.
Don't say that. You know you're welcome to stay as long as it takes.
translation.zh: 别这么说 你待多久都可以 你知道的

translation.en: Yes, thank you, but I think it's just best for everyone I just go.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 但我离开对大家都好

translation.en: But I thought you were gonna stay with us for Christmas.
translation.zh: 但我以为你会跟我们一起过圣诞呢

translation.en: And I would love that, but there's just been a change of plans.
translation.zh: 我也想 但计划有变

translation.en: Something I've been saving for the right moment.
translation.zh: 我一直寻找合适时机拿出来的东西

translation.en: But we need Sarah to help us put it up.
translation.zh: 但我们需要莎拉帮忙挂上去

translation.en: I know, but I don't wanna do this without you.
translation.zh: 我知道我说了什么 但没有你 我不想这么做

translation.en: You know what this place needs right now?
translation.zh: 知道现在这里需要什么吗？

translation.en: -[Sierra and Alejandra laughing] -All right, let's do it! Let's go!
translation.zh: 好了 开始吧！我们走！

translation.en: All right, a little bit closer together.
On the count of three, "Merry Christmas."
All right, you guys enjoy the slopes.
translation.zh: 好的 祝你们滑雪开心

translation.en: Christmas Eve, come to North Star.
translation.zh: 平安夜到北极星旅馆来吧
店里将举办平安夜派对

translation.en: Here you go. Merry Christmas. Christmas party at the North Star.
translation.zh: 给你 圣诞快乐 北极星旅馆的圣诞派对

translation.en: -There's a party at the North Star. -Thank you!
It's December 24th. I know you probably have plans, but we'll be there.
translation.zh: 12月24日 我知道你可能有安排 但我们办了活动

translation.en: These are the best canned beans
Ralph! Have you considered starting a survival blog?
translation.zh: 拉尔夫！你有没有考虑过 开一个生存博客？

translation.en: I'm sure I could get you sponsored.
translation.zh: 我肯定能帮你争取到赞助

translation.en: [chuckles] Well, thank you, Tad. Wouldn't that be something?
translation.zh: 谢谢你 塔德 那不就厉害了嘛？

translation.en: Yeah, they got a little kick. It can sneak up on you.
translation.zh: 是啊 有点劲儿 一点点就上来了

translation.en: Hi! I just got to the hotel. So, give me a call when you get this.
translation.zh: 嗨！我刚到酒店 收到留言打给我

translation.en: Mr. Belmont. [chuckling nervously] Hello, you're back.
translation.zh: 贝尔蒙特先生 您回来了

translation.en: Hi. I need to talk to Sierra, but she's not answering her phone.
translation.zh: 我得跟谢拉谈谈 但她不接我电话

translation.en: -Have her meet me in my office. -I'm sorry, Mr. Belmont.
translation.zh: -让她来我办公室见我 -对不起 贝尔蒙特先生

translation.en: I don't know where she is.
I asked you to take care of her while she was here.
translation.zh: 我让你在她来此期间照顾她

translation.en: Well, yes, but she and Mr. Fairchild went skiing the other day,
translation.zh: 是的 但是那天 她和费尔柴尔德先生去滑雪

translation.en: and that's the last time that I saw her. So…
translation.zh: 那是我最后一次见到她 所以…

translation.en: "The other day"? Are you telling me you haven't seen my daughter in four days?
translation.zh: “那天？” 你是说 你已经四天没见过我女儿了？

translation.en: Well, no, but I just thought she and Mr. Fairchild wanted a little private time together.
translation.zh: 不 我只是觉得 她和费尔柴尔德先生想单独相处

translation.en: And she told me not to bother her. Then… Well, I…
translation.zh: 她叫我不要打扰她 然后我…

translation.en: My daughter never goes anywhere without her luggage.
translation.zh: 我女儿不带行李 哪里都不会去的

translation.en: You, have the security team check the grounds.
Search every inch of the resort.
-I'm on it. -And you, call the Sheriff's Office.
translation.zh: -交给我 -还有你 打电话给警长办公室

translation.en: You tell them that I want them to find my daughter.
translation.zh: 告诉他们 找到我女儿

translation.en: We're gonna need a search party. Got some knuckleheads lost in the pass.
translation.zh: 我们需要一个搜查队 几个笨蛋在山口走丢了

translation.en: [man] Copy that. Do we have any idea who it is?

translation.zh: 知道 是拉尔夫 他又偷猎
准备好了吗 亲爱的？

translation.en: I'm just trying to find something to wear.
Well, actually, that's why I'm here.
translation.zh: 其实 这就是我来的原因

translation.en: I took the liberty of picking up a little something for you to wear tonight.
translation.zh: 我自作主张 给你选了一件今晚穿的

translation.en: Oh my gosh. Thank you so much. You didn't have to.
translation.zh: 我的天啊 非常感谢 你太费心了

translation.en: He hasn't done that in a long time.
translation.zh: 他已经很久没有这样了

translation.en: Oh! I brought you a pair of shoes too.
Ralph, I'm afraid we're gonna have to book you this time.
translation.zh: 拉尔夫 这次恐怕得把你抓起来了

translation.en: What? This is an outrage! That man is a hero.
translation.zh: 什么？太过分了！他可是英雄

translation.en: -He was poaching on government land. -He saved my life.
translation.zh: -他在政府土地上偷猎 -他救了我一命

translation.en: You'll have to arrest me too.
translation.zh: 那你也得把我抓起来了

translation.en: -Oh, it's a long and terrifying tale. -Where's my daughter?
translation.zh: -这是一个很长很可怕的故事 -我女儿呢？

translation.en: I don't know. I expect at the hotel?
translation.zh: 我不知道 应该在酒店吧？

translation.en: No, she's not at the hotel. And I was told she's supposed to be with you.
translation.zh: 她不在酒店 我听说她应该跟你在一起

translation.en: Well, she was, but then we got separated when we were up on the mountain.
translation.zh: 之前是的 但我们上山时就分开了

translation.en: -Looks like I'll be calling you "Dad." -Hey, congratulations.
translation.zh: -看来我得改口叫你“爸爸”了 -嘿 恭喜你

translation.en: -Thank you, friend. -I know where she is. Come on.
translation.zh: -谢谢 好朋友 -我知道她在哪里 来吧
等等 拉尔夫怎么办？

translation.en: You know that that says, "Do not open until Christmas."
translation.zh: 上面可是写着：“圣诞节前不准打开”

translation.en: Jake, do you think we have enough food? I don't want to run out.
translation.zh: 杰克 你觉得食物够吗？ 不够吃就不好了

translation.en: I don't think it's gonna be a problem. It's Christmas Eve.
translation.zh: 应该不成问题 今天是平安夜

translation.en: People got things to do. It's a very last-minute party, so…
translation.zh: 大家各忙各的 咱们又那么晚通知 所以…

translation.en: It's late, and no one's here yet.
translation.zh: 已经晚了 而且还没有人来

translation.en: Don't give up, Jake. You just need a little bit of faith.
translation.zh: 别放弃 杰克 你要有点信心

translation.en: Thank you. Alejandra bought it for me.
translation.zh: 阿列翰德拉 谢谢你给我买礼物

translation.en: Avy, sweetheart, why don't you come help me make some more appetizers.
translation.zh: 艾薇 亲爱的 来帮我准备点开胃小吃吧？

translation.en: -But Dad said we don't need any more. -Avy.

translation.zh: 那么 今晚一切就绪了？

translation.en: Yeah. Moved out a bunch of the tables,
translation.zh: 对 挪走了几张桌子

translation.en: put in a little dance floor, just in case.
translation.zh: 准备好舞池了 以防万一

translation.en: Maybe we should test it out?
translation.zh: 也许我们可以测试一下？

translation.en: I'm not sure if I can dance, but…
translation.zh: 我不知道我会不会跳舞 不过…

translation.en: I have a really good feeling about tonight.
translation.zh: 我有预感 今晚会很棒的

translation.en: Is it weird if I kind of hope nobody shows up?
translation.zh: 要是我希望没人来 会不会很奇怪？

translation.en: I got stuck behind Ed Hudson's snow plow all the way up.
translation.zh: 一路上来 我一直堵在 艾德哈德森的铲雪车后面

translation.en: Well, thank you. Thank you so much for coming.
translation.zh: 谢谢 你们能来真是太好了

translation.en: Yeah, well, it's not just me.
translation.zh: 是啊 不只是我来了

translation.en: -[Jake] Get some food, refreshments. -[man 3] Thank you.
-Everybody seems to be having a good time. -Yes. Now here's your chance. Go.
translation.zh: -大家似乎都玩得很开心 -是的 机会来了 加油

translation.en: No, no. I'm not gonna get up there. I wouldn't know what to say.
translation.zh: 不 我不去 我不知道该说什么

translation.en: Don't worry, you're gonna be great.
Everyone is gonna love you. They're having so much fun.
translation.zh: 大家都会支持你的 他们玩得很开心

translation.en: Excuse me. Uh… Excuse me, everybody.
Um, I just want to say,
if you see a gingerbread house, please don't take a bite.
translation.zh: 如果看到姜饼屋 那可不是用来吃的

translation.en: No, I kid. Um, anyway, hello, everybody.
My name is Jake. I'm the owner of the--
I think everyone knows who you are, Jake.
translation.zh: 我想大家都认识你 杰克

translation.en: Good point. Um… Okay, well, anyway.
translation.zh: 有道理 好了 说起来

translation.en: Thank you all, uh, for being here tonight.
Well, the thing is, the North Star, uh… [clicks tongue]
Well, there is this situation, and, uh…
You know, I remember the first time our family came to the North Star Lodge.
translation.zh: 我记得我们家第一次来北极星旅馆

translation.en: You took my son under your wing and taught him to ski.
translation.zh: 你很关照我儿子 还教他滑雪

translation.en: And I will admit, he wasn't a quick study.
translation.zh: 不得不说 他学得不快

translation.en: No. He was… He was not. [laughs]

translation.zh: 他现在加入滑雪巡逻队了

translation.en: Anyway, I, uh, figured I owe you this much for ski lessons.
translation.zh: 总之 我欠你一些滑雪课时费
霍华德 我不能 这…

translation.en: When we got married, we could not afford a honeymoon.
translation.zh: 刚结婚的时候 我们没钱度蜜月

translation.en: Jake, you gave us the biggest suite in the place for the weekend,
translation.zh: 你让我们在店里最大的套房度周末

translation.en: champagne and everything, and you wouldn't take a dime for it, so…
translation.zh: 还免费赠送香槟什么的 所以…

translation.en: We want to give you… this.
Thank you for this. Thank you so much.
translation.zh: 谢谢你们 非常感谢

translation.en: I think this is good a time as any to make a little announcement of my own.
translation.zh: 我想现在是时候宣布这个消息了

translation.en: Summit Springs town council has put forth a proposal
translation.zh: 山泉村镇议会已经提议

translation.en: to have the North Star Lodge declared a historic site.
translation.zh: 将北极星旅馆定为历史景点

translation.en: Now that should help a bit with funds and grants for renovations and so forth.
translation.zh: 这样应该有助于 筹集资金进行翻修和后续运营

translation.en: Well, here's for that time you towed my car out of that snowbank.
translation.zh: 之前你帮我 把车子从雪堤里拖出来 这是谢礼

translation.en: Oh my gosh. I can't believe you remembered that. [laughs]
translation.zh: 老天爷 你居然还记得

translation.en: You're a good man, Jake. Thank you so much, wow.
translation.zh: -杰克 你是好人 -非常感谢

translation.en: Guys, thank you so much. Merry Christmas.
translation.zh: 各位 谢谢你们 圣诞快乐

translation.en: -[Avy] Thank you. -[woman] We love the North Star.
We're happy to do something for you for a change.
I really don't know what to say. Gosh.
translation.zh: 我真的不知道该说什么 天啊

translation.en: It's all a little overwhelming for me right now. Um…
I would like to say one thing, though. Um…
None of this here tonight would be possible
if it weren't for a very special guest
that we have staying here at the lodge.
She's changed the way I see, uh…
not the least of which is myself.
So, can we just, uh… Can we get her up here? Uh…
Will you come up here for a second?
Everybody, would you please give a big thank you to--
translation.zh: 各位 让我们共同感谢…

translation.en: I found you at last! Darling!
There you go. Reunited for Christmas.
-[woman] What did he say? -[man] His daughter?
translation.zh: -他说什么？ -不是吧 他女儿？

translation.en: Well, of course it's your name.
Hello? It's me Tad Fairchild, your fiancé.
translation.zh: 啊？我是塔德费尔柴尔德 你未婚夫
你是贝尔蒙特先生的女儿？

translation.en: And I've met you before. Last week.
I didn't know who you were.

translation.zh: 我想你一定会记得这个

translation.en: -I think I told you that, right? -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 我好像跟你说过 对吧？

translation.en: I was skiing, and I… and I fell, and I hit a tree.
translation.zh: 我在滑雪时摔倒 然后撞到树上

translation.en: And then I ended up here,
I have no idea what's transpired here,
translation.zh: 我不知道这里发生了什么

translation.en: but clearly, you've taken very good care of my daughter.
translation.zh: 但显然 你对我女儿照顾有加

translation.en: And I appreciate that a great deal.
Let's get you back to the hotel, okay, sweetie?
translation.zh: 我们送你回酒店 好吗 亲爱的？

translation.en: Nice, hot bath, maybe some champagne to help clear your head.
translation.zh: 洗个热水澡 来点香槟醒醒脑

translation.en: [Sierra] Yeah, the hotel. I should get back…
translation.zh: 嗯 酒店 我得回去

translation.en: I don't want you to go.
But I have to go home.
I don't even know what to say.
Her name is Sierra, honey. She's going home.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 她叫谢拉 她要回家了

translation.en: I just wanted to tell you, I don't think I've ever met anyone like you before.
translation.zh: 我只想告诉你 我想我应该从未见过你这样的人

translation.en: I know what I said, but I don't wanna do this without you.
translation.zh: 我知道我说了什么 但没有你 我不想这么做

translation.en: Miss Belmont? Are you up yet?
translation.zh: 贝尔蒙特小姐？您醒了吗？

translation.en: Mr. Fairchild just wanted me to remind you
translation.zh: 费尔柴尔德先生让我提醒您

translation.en: that he's arranged a press conference in two hours.
translation.zh: 他安排了记者招待会 两小时后开始

translation.en: There's been quite a-- Ooh! Sparkly.
Uh, there's been quite a bit of media attention for your ordeal.
translation.zh: 有很多媒体在关注您所经受的磨难

translation.en: Miss Belmont, what are you doing?
translation.zh: 贝尔蒙特小姐 您在做什么？

translation.en: Oh, I'm just helping the housekeepers out a bit.
I found this gorgeous piece, just flown in from Milan.
translation.zh: 我找到了这件华丽的衣服 从米兰运过来的

translation.en: I think I'm gonna go simple today.
translation.zh: 我今天想穿得简单一点

translation.en: Actually, I'm in the mood for something different this morning.
Hope her experience at that dreadful hostel hasn't traumatized her.
translation.zh: 但愿那个可怕的旅馆没给她留下阴影

translation.en: But, darling, the press conference is in 30 minutes.
translation.zh: 可是 亲爱的 记者会30分钟后就要开始了

translation.en: I'm gonna try them on right now.
Thank you so much for my awesome helmet!
translation.zh: 谢谢送我这么赞的头盔！

translation.en: All right. I'm just gonna clean up a little bit. Me too.
People were very generous last night.
I don't think it's gonna make a difference if we don't get any reservations.
translation.zh: 可如果没人订房 帮助也不大

translation.en: And we're gonna need a Christmas miracle.
translation.zh: 我们需要一个圣诞奇迹

translation.en: -[reporter] This breaking news is just in. -Dad!

translation.zh: 酒店大亨博勒加德贝尔蒙特之女

translation.en: daughter of hotel magnate Beauregard Belmont…
translation.zh: 失踪一时的继承人谢拉贝尔蒙特…

translation.en: Let's go live now to the press conference.
translation.zh: 我们在记者会现场进行直播

translation.en: Miss Belmont. Would you tell us in your own words what happened?
translation.zh: 贝尔蒙特小姐 发生了什么事 你去哪里了？
在回答大家的问题之前

translation.en: I would like to thank Jake Russell and his family at the North Star Lodge.
translation.zh: 我想首先感谢 北极星旅馆的杰克拉塞尔一家

translation.en: They took very good care of me at their charming ski resort.
translation.zh: 在他们温馨的滑雪度假屋 我得到了无微不至的照顾

translation.en: Ms. Belmont, what are your plans for the future?
Let me answer that by showing you… this.

translation.zh: -说说求婚细节吧 -费尔柴尔德先生？

translation.en: -Just one more question. -Does this mean you're eloping?
translation.zh: -还有一个问题 -也就是说 你们要私奔吗？

translation.en: [Tad] Isn't it beautiful? [reporter] Who designed the ring?
translation.zh: -很漂亮吧？ -费尔柴尔德先生 戒指是谁设计的？
是杰佛逊戴蒙兹的作品

translation.en: Mr. Fairchild has asked me to marry him.
translation.zh: 费尔柴尔德先生向我求婚了

translation.en: -But I-- -You must be excited, Mr. Belmont.
translation.zh: -但我… -贝尔蒙特先生 您一定很激动吧

translation.en: Excited doesn't come close to describing how I feel.
translation.zh: 激动根本不足以表达我的感受
大好日子选在什么时候？

translation.en: We're keeping that secret. Actually, we're catching a plane in a couple of hours
translation.zh: 对此我们要保密 再过一两个小时 我们要搭乘飞机

translation.en: Guess my Christmas wish didn't come true after all.
translation.zh: 看来我的圣诞愿望没实现

translation.en: When Grandma and I were at The Wishing Tree,
I didn't make a wish for myself.
I made it for you, Dad.
You gave your wish up for me?
translation.zh: 你为我放弃了自己的愿望？

translation.en: I wished for you to find someone to love.
translation.zh: 我希望你能找到喜欢的人

translation.en: You take such good care of all of us.
translation.zh: 你把我们照顾得那么好

translation.en: I just wanted you to have someone take care of you too.
translation.zh: 我只希望也有人能照顾你

translation.en: Avy, honey, um… I just… It's just not that easy.
translation.zh: 艾薇 亲爱的 事情没那么简单

translation.en: Sure, it is. You like her, don't you?
translation.zh: 不会呀 你喜欢她 对吧？

translation.en: -Well, yeah, but it's not-- -Did you ever tell her?
translation.zh: -是啊 可是… -你有告诉她吗？

translation.en: Not in so many words, no.
I think you should tell her.
-Go get dressed. Go tell her. Let's go! -Okay, all right.
translation.zh: -去换衣服 去告诉她 我们走吧！ -好的

translation.en: The roads are closed at this end of the valley.
translation.zh: 山谷这边的路已经封了

translation.en: -Did you and Grandma do this? -No. Where did it come from?
translation.zh: -是你和外婆的主意？ -不是 它从哪里来的？

translation.en: I don't know. I'll go get Balthazar. You coming?
translation.zh: 不知道 我去牵巴尔萨扎 你要来吗？

translation.en: A couple of hours from now, we'll be taking selfies on a beautiful beach.
translation.zh: 再过几个小时 我们就能在漂亮的海滩美美自拍了

translation.en: You know what? You go on ahead.
-Um, I'll meet you at the car. -Don't be too long.
-I won't. -Don't want to miss the flight.
I'm really sorry I didn't get a chance to tell you
translation.zh: 我真的很抱歉 没能找机会告诉您

translation.en: about me and Tad, the engagement.
You know, the most important thing to me is that you're happy.
translation.zh: 对我来说 最重要的是你能幸福

translation.en: Don't worry about the job. It'll be here when you get back.
translation.zh: 不用担心 等你回来 它还是你的

translation.en: That's the thing. I don't want it to be.
translation.zh: 问题就在这里 我不希望这样

translation.en: Vice President of Atmosphere? You just did that to take care of me.
translation.zh: 酒店氛围副总裁？ 您这样做只是想照顾我

translation.en: [sighs] Well, maybe a little, but I--
And I love you for it, and I'll always be your daughter.
translation.zh: 我很感激您 我永远都是您的女儿

translation.en: I just… I need to find my own way. I hope you're not angry.
translation.zh: 只是…我得自己闯出一条路 但愿您别生我的气

translation.en: I don't think I've ever been more proud of you.
translation.zh: 我从未像现在这样为你骄傲

translation.en: I told you I promised your mother that I'd take care of you.
translation.zh: 我告诉过你 我答应过你妈妈会照顾你

translation.en: Looks like you're starting to take care of yourself.
translation.zh: 看来你开始照顾你自己了

translation.en: Your mother would be so proud of you.

translation.zh: 圣诞快乐 这里是北极星旅馆

translation.en: -[man] …place on the news? -Yes, this is the place.
translation.zh: -…新闻里说的地方？ -是的 就是这里

translation.en: -[man] I need a reservation. -For how many?
-[phone rings] -Oh, may I place you on hold for a moment?

translation.zh: 圣诞快乐 这里是北极星旅馆

translation.en: [woman] Is this the place where Sierra Belmont was?
translation.zh: 这里是谢拉贝尔蒙特 之前住过的地方吗？

translation.en: Yes, this is the place where Sierra Belmont stayed.
translation.zh: 没错 她之前就是在这里
冲啊 巴尔萨扎！好小子！

translation.en: -The phone is lighting up like Christmas. -[Jake] You're kidding.
Oh. Can I get you anything?

translation.zh: 谢拉！准备好出发了吗 亲？

translation.en: You're a great guy, but I'm just not ready for this yet.
translation.zh: 你是一个好人 但我还没准备好

translation.en: I thought I was, but I'm not.
translation.zh: 我以为我准备好了 其实不然

translation.en: [chuckles] Are you breaking up with me?
I know you, Tad. You'll be okay by New Year's.
translation.zh: 我了解你 塔德 到新年时你就没事了

translation.en: Do you mind if I post about this on my page?
Nothing like a breakup to really add to your numbers.
translation.zh: 没有什么比分手更能涨粉的了

translation.en: I am so sorry, Mr. Fairchild. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我很遗憾 费尔柴尔德先生

translation.en: Oh! And at the holidays too. Oh.
What are you doing for New Year's?
All right. Are you okay to watch Balthazar?
translation.zh: 好了 你看着巴尔萨扎可以吗？

translation.en: Wait! Wait! Wait! Wait! Stop the car. Don't move.
Look, can you just give me… give me one second.
translation.zh: 听着 你能给我一点时间吗？

translation.en: Look, okay, I… I know we barely know each other,
translation.zh: 听着 好吧 我知道 我们才刚认识

translation.en: and you'll probably gonna think I'm crazy for saying this.
translation.zh: 你可能觉得我这么说是在发疯

translation.en: But I… I can't let you leave without telling you I'm falling in love with you.
translation.zh: 但我必须在你离开前 让你知道 我爱上你了

translation.en: Well, that's very flattering, but I have other plans.
translation.zh: 多谢青睐 但我另有安排了

translation.en: I believe what you're looking for is in the back courtyard.
translation.zh: 我相信你要找的人在后院

translation.en: Uh, no, change of plans. I'm staying here
translation.zh: 不 计划有变 我要留在这里

translation.en: So, what are you doing here?
Uh… I… I just wanted to say thank you.
I just found out the North Star is sold out for the rest of the season.
translation.zh: 我刚听说北极星旅馆本季已经订满了

translation.en: Really? Hm. Sold out, huh? Sounds like you might need some help running the place.
translation.zh: 真的吗？订满了？ 看来你可能需要人手帮忙经营了

translation.en: Well, my dad did also mention investing in the North Star,
translation.zh: 我爸也说过要投资北极星旅馆

translation.en: but I didn't think you'd be interested.
translation.zh: 但我觉得你可能没兴趣

translation.en: I did say I would try to convince you over the holidays.
translation.zh: 我说我会尽量趁度假说服你

translation.en: That is, if you wouldn't mind spending them with me.
translation.zh: 当然 如果你不介意跟我一起度假

translation.en: But I bumped my head on the way over here,
and for the life of me, I can't remember what it is.
translation.zh: 怎么也想不起来是什么传统了

translation.en: Yeah, I think I can help you out with that.
Oh, it's Tad, Daddy. And, uh… It wasn't meant to be. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 爸 他叫塔德 我们俩不合适

translation.en: -Happy you're here, Jake. -It's good to see you, Mr. Belmont.
translation.zh: -很高兴你来了 杰克 -很高兴见到您 贝尔蒙特先生

translation.en: -What a Christmas, guys. -Yeah, it's one I'll never forget.
translation.zh: -各位 多么美好的圣诞节 -是啊 我永远不会忘记

translation.en: And I see you've met my daughter, Avy…
translation.zh: 看来您见过我女儿艾薇了…

translation.en: Tad, I told you a place in the lobby. Where are you?
translation.zh: 塔德 我说了在大厅见 你在哪里？

translation.en: I'm so sorry. I didn't see you there.
translation.zh: 真抱歉 我没看见你
没事 我们还在缠呢

translation.en: Come on! Moving skis. Okay, let's do it.
translation.zh: 来吧！移动雪板 我们走着

translation.en: You've made a Christmas wish without me?
translation.zh: 不等我就许圣诞愿望了？

translation.en: This is so beautiful. Why don't you put it on the tree?
translation.zh: 好美啊 为什么不挂树上？

translation.en: Tad, it's not voice-activated! Get me off of this thing! You're ridiculous!
translation.zh: 塔德 这不是声控的！ 放我下来！你太胡闹了！
-救星 你叫什么名字？ -拉尔夫

translation.en: I'm not used to seeing women here at the lodge.
translation.zh: 我不习惯在旅馆看到女人

translation.en: I think you just need to be more polite, darling.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 你应该再客气一点

translation.en: Give me one more because I can't stop…
translation.zh: 再来一遍 我憋不住…

translation.en: I can't stop laughing right now.
We're gonna get so many partiers.
-Do I have anything on my nose? -Yeah. [giggling]
[laughing] I don't know how that happened.
All you have to go is just go up there and show your heart--
translation.zh: 你只需要走上前去 表明心意…

translation.en: Would you please tell that large, muscular man behind me
translation.zh: 能不能告诉后面那位大号肌肉男
